metadata.title: CVE-2023-2617 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in OpenCV wechat_qrcodeModule up to 4.7.0. Affected by this vulnerability is the functionDecodedBitStreamParser::decodeByteSegment of the fileqrcode/decoder/decoded_bit_stream_parser.cpp. The manipulation leads tonull pointer dereference. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploithas been disclosed to the public and may be used. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of thisvulnerability is VDB-228547.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2617` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopencv-calib3d406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-contrib406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-core406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-dnn406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-features2d406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-flann406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-highgui406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-imgcodecs406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-imgproc406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-java - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-ml406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-objdetect406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-photo406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-shape406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-stitching406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-superres406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-video406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-videoio406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-videostab406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv-viz406t64 - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
libopencv406-jni - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
opencv-data - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
python3-opencv - 4.6.0+dfsg-12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opencv package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.6.0+dfsg-12').
